pros: These clippers are sturdy, sharp, and easy to control
Unlike most competitors, the handles and jaws are not prone to breaking
5 inches in length from blade to handle
cons: The spring may break after moderate use

customer_reviews.title: When you get over 70 years of age cutting your ...
customer_reviews.text: When you get over 70 years of age cutting your toe nails becomes a major problem. These toenail clippers were everything that I hope. I was able to cut the toenails with out any discomfort. The thickness of the nail is no long a problem.
customer_reviews.author: cdon

customer_reviews.title: My quest for a toenail clipper has ended...
customer_reviews.text: I used it two days ago and I received wonderful results on my toenails. It clipped my toenails with ease, a smooth straight cut. I had suffered from thick, dry, ingrown toenails for a while and was contemplating going to a podiatrist because the old pair of clippers I used just wasn't working for me. So one day I was googling (toenail clippers), and came across an article listing the top toenail clippers on the market....well this one was listed. I read about the product, and the reviews, then bought the product. I am a satisfied customer! 😀
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have had these clippers for 6 months and used ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had these clippers for 6 months and used them about 6 times. Yesterday when I used them the "spring" in the middle of the handles broke. Apparently I cannot return them. I expected to use these clippers more times. Also, in general, these clippers were hard to close. I am older and my toenails are thick...but not that thick. I will be looking for another brand now.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie S.

customer_reviews.title: No sharp edge on mine
customer_reviews.text: I have just sent these back. With all the good reviews I really thought these would be great. I had to have gotten a defective pair as i dont really have thick nails at all and i couldnt even cut a fingernail. The only reason i wanted them was to make straight cut on long fingernails. I almost wripped my nail off bending and sqeezing the clippers to try to make them cut. Had to put one star or it would be none
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Very Thick Toe Nails.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I suffer with psoriasis, and it creates very thick toenails. It was impossible to find something that cut nicely that wasn't cheap.. This actually worked for me and has worked since I purchased it. I have to cut my toenails pretty often, and this really helps to keep them trimmer and lighter and once you get past those initial difficult cuts, if you keep it up, it becomes much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Seams To Be Sew

customer_reviews.title: Great Clippers
customer_reviews.text: This seller is great. This is my second order from them since this product wirks well. The clippers are very sharp. I ordered a set for my husband since he was so impressed with mine. Thank you for proving great products!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a few months. The metal clip in between handles broke.
customer_reviews.author: textwoman

customer_reviews.title: Not the same old drugstore junk
customer_reviews.text: Have used generic clippers and scissors from ordinary drugstores for many years. That said, these Fox Medical Equipment clippers are lightyears ahead of the mainstream products. The quality of materials and workmanship is immediately apparent. Very good products delivered in a timely fashion. I definitely recommend Fox products.
customer_reviews.author: hank the crank

customer_reviews.title: Large Clippers
customer_reviews.text: A good clipper but the metal spring device has broken after only 6 months and 25 uses or so. Now I know why the old pair I had since childhood never had a spring, I guess they just don't last. Also the Podiatrist has a better point and slimmer than this. This is like any other clipper when trying to cut out an ingrown toe nail, it feels like your trying to drive a wedge in there.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: It works - but needs a spring
customer_reviews.text: I have one thick toenail, and my regular toenail clippers wouldn’t open up enough. It worked! I didn’t’ give it five stars , because it is a little cumbersome to use. If it had a spring to hold it open, it would have been a slam dunk five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Funnyguy 84

customer_reviews.title: So easy for a senior like me to clip his toenails ...
customer_reviews.text: Podiatrist's toenail clippers I tried for the first time as soon as I received it last week, they met and exceeded my expectations. So easy for a senior like me to clip his toenails in less than 5 minutes. I used to struggle before with other clippers. Thank you for making it available on-line for Amazon customers. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Armen Abajian

customer_reviews.title: Spring is of poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The clippers are great as far as doing what they are supposed to do,which is cut. Unfortunately, the spring mechanism is of poor quality and will break on you within a couple of months. This is the 3rd pair I am purchasing and only come back to them because the size and design is perfect for my hands. I wish the vendor would read these reviews and make the necessary changes to what could be a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Spring steel breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Used only maybe 10 times in the last 6 months after purchase, the spring steel broke already. So now the scissors doesn't open on its own now. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: T Fuh

customer_reviews.title: ... PAIR THAT I BOUGHT A FRIEND BORROWED MINE AND LIKED THEM SO WELL SHE ASKED TO GET HER A ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE SECOND PAIR THAT I BOUGHT A FRIEND BORROWED MINE AND LIKED THEM SO WELL SHE ASKED TO GET HER A PAIR THEY ARE GREAT ,,,,, P.S. MY FRIEND IS A DOCTOR AND STATED THAT THEY ARE DOCTOR GRADE SHE IS INTERNAL MEDICINE AND IF A SHE THINKS THEY ARE GOOD GRADE THEN I WOULD BUY THEM IF I NEEDED NAIL CLIPPERS .
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed. The style of these clippers are perfect for arthritic hands. Nicely sharp, cuts easily even on tough nails. I'd recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.featherpicker

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Reading reviews on other clippers that show handle breaking due to cheaper metal decided on buying a higher price product. This clipper is well made and sharp. Should have many years of use. I will also try it on my dog's nail next time which will put less pressure on her nails than a regular dog nail clipper.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product. I purchased the clippers for my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy product. I purchased the clippers for my husband who has really thick horrible toe nails that are hard to cut. He has not used the clippers yet but I did. They get into areas, such as where your nail would be ingrown, well and they cut well but you have to have a lot of hand strength to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, sharp and with a nice heft behind it. It feels good to use and is made very well with the blades on the tip having very even and direct contact for a clean cut.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Myszka

customer_reviews.title: PHOTO SHOWS DIFFERENT CLIPPERS!
customer_reviews.text: Based on the manufacturer‘s photo, it appears that the clipper has a straight—not curved bottom edge. This isn’t true and is unlike the ones my Podiatrist uses. The edge is curved like 99% of clippers sold everywhere. I’ll grant that it’s a nice stainless steel and has a spring clip for ease in cutting. This will go back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cutter. I strongly recommend this product. Nail fungus is hard to get rid of but these cutters helped to remove the infected area
customer_reviews.author: Gary Cararini

customer_reviews.title: The opening space is enough
customer_reviews.text: I used this cutter for the first time yesterday; it cut even the thickest of my toe nails.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce B.

customer_reviews.title: A doctor's grade thing people can easily use
customer_reviews.text: Now that I'm older, my toenails have gotten harder and reaching them has become a problem. Because these clippers are a real medical tool they work well and easily. This was 90% of the battle; the reaching is just a minor inconvenience now. John Traugut
customer_reviews.author: John P. Traugut

customer_reviews.title: You won't be trimming horse's hooves with these things, but they are great for fingernails and toenails.  Excellent workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice toenail clippers. They're sharp and cut evenly. The little folding spring on the handle is great as is the protective slip-on cover for the cutting head. I'm very happy with these clippers.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin J Jensen

customer_reviews.title: WHERE CAN I FIND AN EXTRA SPRING FOR MY TOENAIL.
customer_reviews.text: TOENAIL CLIPPER, IS A TOOL THAT I ALWAYS NEED, YET I WONDER, WHERE CAN I FIND A REPLACEMENT OF ITS SPRING WHICH USUALLY BREAKS SOON. MICHOS TZOVARAS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great clippers/Not so great spring
customer_reviews.text: I originally asked for these clippers as a present. I used them for a year or two, and then the piece of metal that provides the "spring", broke. The literature says the clippers are guaranteed, but since they were a gift, I went ahead and purchased another pair, instead of trying to return them. Other than the spring breaking after a couple years of use, they are wonderful clippers for both toenails and fingernails. They stay sharp and have the power to cut through very tough nails! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Eller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These toenail cutters are very sharp and cut through very thick toenails.
customer_reviews.author: Harold A. Sloas, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Solid, not flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: A solid implement that works very well. I waited to review it to make sure it works well. Being solid, I expect it to hold up over time, but the guarantee/warranty on it would come in handy if it does not. Update 3/19: The spring mechanism has broken. The only weak part of the clippers. The mechanism must be made of more solid material than a paper clip. Now must try to return/replace, problem is, that weak part, the spring mechanism, is going to have the same problem, I suspect.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great toenail clippers!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse in long term care. These clippers are fantastic for difficult nails. I am able to trim nails for my residents that other nurses wouldn't touch. They're great! I'm so glad I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stariha

customer_reviews.title: They are wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: They are wonderful!!!! I love this product!!! I have thick toenails and have had difficulty in cutting them for years!!! I am happy to say that these clippers make life so much easier!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Seeley

customer_reviews.title: Not quite there
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good buy but after using awhile the spring broke and it is hard to hold onto when using in the more difficult positions (such as left handed).
customer_reviews.author: W. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Work really well. Will never buy those scrappy clippers at the drugstores anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Lourie A. Cherundolo

customer_reviews.title: Love these clippers
customer_reviews.text: I love these clippers. They cut thick toenails with ease, are excellent quality & a good price. I was searching for good quality clippers so I would only have to buy once. I can tell that these will last a long time because of the quality. I recently received these clippers & immediately liked how they felt in my hand & cut so smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Palermo

customer_reviews.title: Medical Grade
customer_reviews.text: Do Not buy. I bought this because of description. I had previously bought another brand but were over a year old. Old brand was well used and very good but had gotten a little dull. The Fox Medical clippers were not sharp at all. Going back to others
customer_reviews.author: Kalen

customer_reviews.title: Cut It Right 1st Time
customer_reviews.text: Very handy, cuts right every time. This replaced an old pair of another brand. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Catpaws

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse practitioner that does alot of nail care of seniors. My patients have very hard, thick nails that are painful and difficult to trim. These clippers are great! They are very easy to use, sharp and I can sterilize or soak in disinfectant. These clippers should not be used by those that have poor eyesight or dexterity. They are SHARP and have a pointed tip that could cause significant damage to the tissue.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good but not professional
customer_reviews.text: While good tie nail clippers, not professional grade. Did not make cutting my husbands thick diabetic toe nails any easier than the last drug store pair.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Moon Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Chinese product
customer_reviews.text: The ad didn't say anything about the manufacturer, so I hope iot would be made from some other countries different from China. Unluckily, when I opened my package and checked, it was really made from China. It's not really as sharp as it was advertised. I don't know if somebody else needs to use more forece than I do, but I'm 75, so I had to squeeze hard to cut my toe nail which is infected by fungus. Anyway, it's ok to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Mama likes this for using on her toenails do I need to say anymore because everybody knows that “ happy wife makes a happy life”
customer_reviews.author: Steve in CA

customer_reviews.title: I have been very happy with my new toenail clippers
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with my new toenail clippers. Since I have super hard nails I soak my nails prior to clipping them. The clippers always deliver very smooth results. So far I haven't had any problem with them.They are very comfortable to cut nails with.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, sharp clippers!
customer_reviews.text: I love thes clippers! They have a straight cutting edge (my old ones were curved) so you can cut straight across the nail! They are also very sharp and cut very easily! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Salmans

customer_reviews.title: A very disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: This toenail clipper is very hard to use. The strength it requires for me to cut toenails is so high that the pressure of the clipper against my palm sends shooting pain through my nerves. By comparison, I can cut the same toenails with my small SEKI EDGE clipper just by using thumb and index. I will be returning this clipper.
customer_reviews.author: Edouard Brenneisen

customer_reviews.title: They don't clip good
customer_reviews.text: Have very thick toe nails and these clippers do not clip well at all - that is the headline since that is what they are supposed to do. In addition, they have no spring back opening so each time you have to re-open them to make the next clip. Had to go back to my small wire snips that work 100% better. Wish I had never spent the money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. H

customer_reviews.title: Cuts thick nails very well
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the clippers were sharp enough and sturdy enough to handle my elderly mothers thickened toenails. I would prefer to have a rubberized grip to prevent slipping, but other than that, they worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Carol W

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: these are absolutely worthless. No way can I put enough pressure on them to get them to cut my toenails. I just now got around to trying to use them so didn't know how useless they were. I have waited too long to return them so I guess I'll just throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: GLENN POOLE

customer_reviews.title: Good clippers
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind that these are slightly small in overall size, but I wanted that for travel. Cuts well, nicely made
customer_reviews.author: Steve_in_TN

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and a decent sharpness to the cutting blades
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and a decent sharpness to the cutting blades. Took a star away due to the final finish toward the handles/grips as they need more radiusing and deburr of the uncomfortable pointed shape in the metal at the ends.
customer_reviews.author: Garth Clark

customer_reviews.title: Works for thick nails.
customer_reviews.text: Finally a clipper that could handle thick nails. Easily clips small pieces at a time to prevent nail cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn Hay

customer_reviews.title: But my first impression was they made of good quality steel and should do a good job
customer_reviews.text: I did not have time to check these clippers on my toenails with problems. But my first impression was they made of good quality steel and should do a good job. The time will show....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Medical Grade Clippers/Very Sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toenail clippers, very sharp blades, even better when they are medical grade. One of the better purchases I've made thus far. With conventional toenail clippers it was a chore to clip my toenails. These Fox Medical Toenail Clippers made it a pleasurable experience, it's no longer a chore.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Spring in clippers broke off after a couple uses. Clippers still work however. Just disappointed in quality of the mechanism. UPDATE. The company has sent a replacement and responded to my email immediatly.Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: michael j deni

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy duty. Perfect for the job.
customer_reviews.text: Ohhhhh yeah. This is exactly what I was hoping for. Good strong, sharp toenail clippers for family member with super thick and in-grown toenails.
customer_reviews.author: M. Delez

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Sharp
customer_reviews.text: The nail clipper performed as advertised. Very sharp and cut thick large toe nails.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Gundersen

customer_reviews.title: Saves money on trips to the podiatrist
customer_reviews.text: These are just like the podiatrist uses. Excellent clippers and very sharp so be careful. They cut my mom's really thick toenails without me needing to take her in to have the doctor do it for a $45 copay
customer_reviews.author: debbie700

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy as the Dr uses but better then a toe or finger nail clippers
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: Seems okay quality but does not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I tried but ended up cutting way to short. I'll go back to clippers.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G

customer_reviews.title: Buy these clippers if you have thick toe nails!!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic and are so sharp and accurate, even I can cut my thicker toes with my arthritic hands. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Miller

customer_reviews.title: It works just fine
customer_reviews.text: It's okay and it works just be careful you don't cut your toe off .
customer_reviews.author: seaworthy

customer_reviews.title: Pedicure rated.
customer_reviews.text: Just what's needed to keep your toes Healthly and painless.
customer_reviews.author: Solar Reigns

customer_reviews.title: Good clippers, and I am satisfied with them
customer_reviews.text: Good clippers, and I am satisfied with them. BUT they could be better if they allowed for a greater/stronger grip and if they were also a bit larger. Tough toenails are not easy to cut.
customer_reviews.author: Avanti07

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: "CLIPPERS EXCEEDED EXPECTATIONS. THEY ARE SHARP AND POWERFUL AND SIMPLE TO USE.
customer_reviews.author: user

customer_reviews.title: Exerting pressure to cut through thick toe nails is extremely painful on the fingers and wrists
customer_reviews.text: While very sharp, the handle needs to be a bit bigger to help those of us with either rheumatoid or psoriatic arthritis. Exerting pressure to cut through thick toe nails is extremely painful on the fingers and wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Primer

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think it was very sharp. I personal had a hard time cutting thru mine. Its ok but not great like the other reviews on it that I read. Worth a Try though.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Haubenschild

customer_reviews.title: They're toe nail cutters
customer_reviews.text: packaged well, came on time. Quite sharp - I've been using them and I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stolzenberger

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this pair of toenail clippers. They are lightweight and cut very easily. They are exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Deeleeboo

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like these but they don't seen as sharp as my old ones right on the tip. However, they do the job and that's all I need. For me, a slightly padded handle would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tawanna

customer_reviews.title: The best clippers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father is 86 years old he definitely needed a sharp pair of clippers and these are extremely sharp and cut very well recommend it to anybody thank you
customer_reviews.author: Billy brockway

customer_reviews.title: Sharp blades, but don't work for my thick toenails
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these are sharp. They don't work nearly as well as my toenail scissors. They don't cut cleanly through, leaving the big toenails jagged and split. They are way too large for my other toenails. I have gone back to using my toenail scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Mahimom

customer_reviews.title: Not very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought it just weeks ago, but I believe this item should be durable for years. For who plan to buy it: Please think about how you would hold it and cut your nails especially toe nails. For me, it is not very easy to use and needs some care to not hurt my finger.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Do the Job Very Well
customer_reviews.text: Love these nail clippers. Lightweight; easy to hold and easy to use. Sharp and do the job far better than others I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made and seemingly high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp, arrived on schedule, in holding it in my hand it seems easy to use, I didn't rate maneuverability, because I havent actually used them. I'm disabled so that will be the real test. Will get back to you.on that.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hancock

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT TOENAIL CLIPPER. VERY HIGH QUALITY...WORKS BETTER THAN ANY OF MY PREVIOUS CLIPPERS.
customer_reviews.author: Mary O'connell

customer_reviews.title: Precision tool
customer_reviews.text: Easy to manage even though my hands are not as strong as they used to be. Gives user great control and precision.
customer_reviews.author: Xrayrose

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but not magic.
customer_reviews.text: THese work much better than any other clippers I have ever used. But, for reasons I don't know. They are not as magically easy to use as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Ruina

customer_reviews.title: Nice well made clippers
customer_reviews.text: Nice clippers, smaller then expected but cut 90 year olds toe nails easily
customer_reviews.author: Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these clippers. Idk why I ever used the flat drugstore clippers.
customer_reviews.author: bfd553

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Toenails - not so much fingernails
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a GREAT toenail clipper - Very sharp so if you do use it for fingernails BE Careful
customer_reviews.author: grumpyoldgeezer

customer_reviews.title: Medical grade toenail clippers
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I found these, the cheap ones at the stores around here are not sharp enough. Be careful, they are sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Nice clippers, well made
customer_reviews.text: These are well made clippers. They cut even tough nails really well. I'm pleased with this purchase. Purchased as a Lightning deal on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: SnowbirdTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great toe nail clippers
customer_reviews.text: Regular toe nail clippers were not working. My podiatrists used this tool which made clipping my toenails easy - so I purchased one
customer_reviews.author: Ethel Sengstacke

customer_reviews.title: but it really seems to be a fine quality item so far
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t really had a chance to use much yet, but it really seems to be a fine quality item so far!
customer_reviews.author: J. R. W

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Clippers, Medical Grade... Took ...
customer_reviews.text: High Quality Clippers, Medical Grade... Took a bit longer than I thought to get them in, but still worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The blade is very curved and it doesn’t allow for a straight cut. Also, I’m not sure why but when it cuts it snaps the nails and they go flying and it cracks further into the nail than I want to cut. Not what I was looking for at all.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Medical Grade Toenail Clippers Podiatrist's..
customer_reviews.text: I am well pleased with these clippers and are as advertised. Extremely sharp and I don't have to strain cutting my toenails.
customer_reviews.author: Petert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: "My manicurist recommended I get these. She said they are very good quality. She should know, right? :)"
customer_reviews.author: elva veliz

customer_reviews.title: broken after 4 month
customer_reviews.text: The weld on lever to make handles open broke so they are totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Baker

customer_reviews.title: Really Junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: After only 3 months of MINIMAL use, the spring on this device broke, which makes this device difficult to use. This is a very disappointing piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Bob K.

customer_reviews.title: Worked first time out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Clippers work very good. Have only used once but are a great improvement what I had been using.
customer_reviews.author: JamesL43

customer_reviews.title: my husband was happy with these clippers
customer_reviews.text: Sharp and effective, my husband was happy with these clippers. Finally found ones he liked!
customer_reviews.author: SageAlum

customer_reviews.title: They are useless,
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cut my toenails. It would not begin to cut them. I had my husband try because his hands are stronger than mine. He had a very difficult time but was able to cut a little. I would never order these again!
customer_reviews.author: M. K.

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: They don't work any better or worse than all of the others I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Randy I

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and nice to hold with my bad hands
customer_reviews.author: Cathi Botelho

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sharp and fit comfortably in your hand, making them easy to use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RODNEY S ELSE

customer_reviews.title: They cut great, but the spring broke after the second use
customer_reviews.text: They cut great, but the spring broke after the second use. Too lazy to return. We will live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Blanks

customer_reviews.title: More than satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one pair of these and they were great. I ordered three more pairs--one for an extra for us in case ours got misplaced and one for each of our sons. Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Grinny

customer_reviews.title: Middle of the road
customer_reviews.text: They seem like a good product but I couldn't even try them out. They are only about 5 inches long total length. I am a big guy and I have kinda big hands, but I could only get two fingers on the handle. They were also to small to generate adequate pressure to cut my toenails. I tried three nails with poor results.
customer_reviews.author: Hotthammer

customer_reviews.title: Best clippers ever
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made of heavy stainless steel. Very sharp and easy to use. Best clippers I have ever used. excellent deal!
customer_reviews.author: Samplerman

customer_reviews.title: the product is a nippers, not a clippers.
customer_reviews.text: the close up picture in the add is not the nippers i received.this product is 15.95 in a local drug store.i paid 17.95with shipping it was over 26.00. this is not a profession clippers used by a podiatrist.i would like my money back.thank you, elaine koch.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: They are very sharp and work really well with thick ...
customer_reviews.text: They are very sharp and work really well with thick toenails. I can't believe I waited so long to get them!

product_meta.title: Medical-Grade Toenail Clippers – Podiatrist's Nippers for Thick and Ingrown Nails
product_meta.description:
Dealing with extra thick or ingrown toenails? These clippers tackle the toughest nails with ease and precision without tearing or breaking nails.

Run-of-the-mill toenail clippers buckle under the pressure of thick, hard nails. Instead of throwing away yet another pair, why not try these Podiatrist’s Toenail Clippers by Fox Medical Equipment? These heavy duty, long-handled trimmers feature ultra-sharp blades that effortlessly cut through the toughest, driest toenails, leaving behind a smooth edge in just one pass. FINALLY, a powerful, high-end pair of toenail clippers ideal for men and women who suffer from diabetes, psoriasis, or ingrown toenails. Even better, our clippers are made from surgical-grade stainless steel. That means the blades stay sharper for longer—and won’t rust or tarnish over time! This is one pair of trimmers you’ll have for years and years. We even include a protective plastic tip cover to help prevent accidental injury and safeguard the blades during storage. Clipping toenails is not a fun chore. But with our Podiatrist’s Toenail Clippers, you can get the job done fast and get back to life.

INCLUDES OUR NO-FUSS LIFETIME GUARANTEE!

Ultra-sharp blades for thicker toenails
Medical-grade stainless steel
Won’t rust or tarnish
Long handles; ergonomic design
Ideal for seniors and disabled individuals
Includes protective cap

Click ‘Add to Cart’ to buy now!
feature_bullets: Thick, Dry, or Ingrown Nails? These hand-sharpened toenail clippers have razor-sharp blades that cut smoothly through thicker nails with ease. Perfect for people with diabetes or psoriasis.
Won’t Rust, Tarnish or Corrode: Manufactured from medical-grade stainless steel, which prevents rusting and also helps ensure blades stay sharper longer. These are podiatrist-quality!
Unconditional 100% Guarantee: These clippers are guaranteed for life! But if you’re not satisfied for any reason, let us know and receive a no-hassle refund.
Ergonomic for Ease of Use: Extra-long handles and satin finish provide enhanced grip and leverage for seniors, people with arthritis & disabled individuals. Retractable spring clip.
Protective Cover Included: Plastic tip cover helps protect the ultra-sharp blades when not in use and reduces the risk of injury.
